name: Ninja Peas
description:
Note: The game still in development, but almost finished. I'm just solving some bugs and adding some graphical effects.

Description

Ninja peas is a game where you have a pea that moves around the board and interacts with its environment allowing him to score points. This pea thinks he is a ninja, and loves to jump and climb blocks.

The pea climbs up and jumps off towers, down ramps, bounces on springs and moves slowly over gel blocks.

The aim of the game is to collect the maximum number of flags you can before the timeout.

Take care of your pea! if he fall more than 2 blocks, he will die!

Score rules:

To score more than 1 point for each flag, see the following instructions:

  • You will receive 10 points if you catch a flag while falling from an edge of a block.
  • You will receive 5 points if you catch a flag while jumping between blocks.
  • In other cases, you will receive only 1 point for each flag

Block types

Standard Blocks

  • Climbing: Peas can climb the sides of the block.
  • Walking: Peas move across the surface of the block at full speed.
  • Collision with top: Falling peas stop when they land on the top of the block. If the fall is greater than 2 blocks in height, the pea dies.
  • Collision with side: Falling peas bounce off the side

Spring Blocks

  • Climbing: Peas can’t climb the sides of the block.
  • Walking: Peas move across the surface of the block at full speed.
  • Collision with top: Falling peas are launched upward with greater velocity if they fall on the top of the block. Angle of incidence equals angle of reflection.
  • Collision with side: Falling peas bounce off the side

Gelatin Blocks

  • Climbing: Peas can’t climb the sides of the block.
  • Walking: Peas move across the surface of gelatin at 1/2 speed.
  • Collision with top: Falling peas stop when they land on the top of the block. Gelatin provides a safe landing spot for high jumpers.
  • Collision with side: Falling peas bounce off the side

Ramp Blocks

  • Climbing: Peas can climb the backside of the ramp.
  • Walking: Peas climb up or down the ramp at full speed.
  • Collision with top: Falling peas bounce off the sides of the ramp at an angle and lose a little velocity. If they hit the ramp from a height larger than 3 blocks, they die.
  • Collision with side: Falling peas bounce off the side

Game assets and the original game prototype rules can be found here: Play with your peas - LostGarden
